term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - isomer shift in Mössbauer spectroscopy
term.title: isomer shift

item.text: Measure of the energy difference between the source (E s) and the absorber(Ea) transition. The measured Doppler velocity shift, δ, is related to the energy difference by E a- E s = δ E γ c is the Mössbauer gamma energy and c is the speed of light in vacuum.

item.alttext: E a- E s = δ E γ c

sources.item: PAC, 1976, 45, 211. 'Nomenclature and Conventions for Reporting Mössbauer Spectroscopic Data' on page 214 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197645030211)
